work.title: Komunitas Chinese Indonesia (KCI) Website
work.summary: Community platform connecting Indonesian-Chinese community members
work.description: A modern community website for Komunitas Chinese Indonesia (KCI), featuring a distinctive burgundy and gold color scheme that reflects cultural heritage. The platform serves as a central hub for the Indonesian-Chinese community with bilingual content (Indonesian and Chinese). Built with React and Next.js for optimal performance, the website includes a comprehensive Visi & Misi section outlining the organization's goals, event management features for community gatherings, member directories, and a content management system for cultural articles and announcements. The design incorporates traditional elements like cloud patterns and gradient overlays while maintaining modern web standards and responsive layouts for all devices.

work.title: Crypto Path - Cryptocurrency Learning Platform
work.summary: Educational platform for cryptocurrency and blockchain learning in Indonesian
work.description: Crypto Path is an educational platform designed to make cryptocurrency and blockchain technology accessible to Indonesian learners. The platform features a modern dark theme with gold accents, creating an engaging and professional learning environment. With the tagline 'Belajar Crypto Secara Praktikal dan Terbuka' (Learn Crypto Practically and Openly), the platform offers structured courses, interactive learning modules, and gamification elements to enhance student engagement. Built with React, Next.js, and TypeScript for a robust and type-safe codebase, the platform includes progress tracking, community features for peer learning, practical exercises, and AI-powered recommendations. The responsive design ensures seamless access across all devices, while the Indonesian language interface makes complex crypto concepts more approachable for local audiences.
